Phobia listened to the battle with great concern, KitKat was losing, 
that didn't bode well for his future. The spider opened a comm to his 
baby "KitKat, don't be afraid, I placed a transmitter in your fur." 
He didn't like giving away his secrets but saw no other option." Lead 
them back toward my ship, I'll meet you half way."

he started up the engines and lifted the ship into the air setting a 
course for the battle.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Etchingar waited for the fight with Deemos and his gang.
> 
> "One VS. 3, no weapons! No interference!" Etchingar said. He got 
ready for combat.
> 
> "Deal." Deemos repied. Deemos moved his blaster up and shot 
Etchingar. Deemos laghed and stepped back. Diskus and Artist beat on 
Etchingar with maces and shot him with lots of different weapons, 
they took most of these from the Maximal base. Etchingar was bloody 
now. Diskus and Artist quickly pulled out swords and sliced into 
Etchingar with them. Etchingar was being mutilated here. Deemos sat 
back and watched. Etchingar dodged a shot and opened up with punches 
on Artist and Diskus. Etchingar beat them down and kicked them while 
they were down. Deemos simply stepped up from behind and impaled 
Etchingar with a long knife. Etchingar clutched the knife until 
Deemos removed it. Etchingar fell.
> 
> "Your friend lost." Deemos said to KitKat...
